v8:item.v8:content: Advance invoicing is normally used for customer orders for larger amounts or longer delivery schedules. After invoicing, the orders should be shipped by goods issues. Advance invoice impacts only accounts receivable.
Update the values in the Reserve column.
Discount is not available for viewing
The total amount of discounts is greater than the document amount
Populate the sales invoice with data from the order.
Fill the Reserve column with the reserved quantities of goods in warehouses.
View discounts applied to the line
